ComicInfo.Summary:
Brooklyn Zirconia (Part Three): In a flashback to 1995, Amir executes an ill-advised move based on Yacoub's advice and gets himself disowned by his father.
Chapter Three: We've All Lost Men: Newburn and Emily investigate a string of rapid succession murders within the four families. Emily is brought for the first time to the Black Castle, a neutral ground for the families to talk and work out differences. A break in the case is made when the commonality between the victims is finally detected.
ComicInfo.Title: Brooklyn Zirconia (Part Three); Chapter Three: We've All Lost Men
ComicInfo.Colorist: Ziyed Yusuf Ayoub,Jacob Phillips,Ziyed Yusuf Ayoub,Jacob Phillips
